headline: Ask HN: How to Get Better Results from Your Google Ads
description:
I was reading the following article. They are suggesting few steps to improve the results of google ads. Do you think google ads is google for small business?

https://sharptag.blogspot.com/2022/02/tips-to-get-better-results-from-your-google-ads.html
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何从你的谷歌广告中获得更好的结果
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何從你的谷歌廣告中獲得更好的結果
description_zh-Hans:
我正在阅读以下文章。他们建议采取一些步骤来提高谷歌广告的效果。你认为谷歌广告是谷歌的小企业吗？

https://sharptag.blogspot.com/2022/02/tips-to-get-better-results-from-your-google-ads.html
description_zh-Hant:
我正在閱讀以下文章。他們建議採取一些步驟來提高谷歌廣告的效果。你認為谷歌廣告是谷歌的小企業嗎？

https://sharptag.blogspot.com/2022/02/tips-to-get-better-results-from-your-google-ads.html
